OCD.name: Samples - Reverse Replicator
OCD.description: Provides a simple mechanism for reverse replicating nodes. A Reverse replicator agent must be setup on the Server.

AD.name: Sling Event Topics
AD.description: Sling Events to listen to via this Sling Event Handler.Values are limited to: org/apache/sling/api/resource/Resource/ADDED, org/apache/sling/api/resource/Resource/CHANGED, org/apache/sling/api/resource/Resource/REMOVED

AD.name: Synchronous Replication
AD.description: Should the replication be done synchronous or asynchronous? The default is 'false'.

AD.name: Supress Status Update
AD.description: If set to true the replication will not update the replication status properties after a replication. Default is 'true'.

AD.name: Supress Versioning
AD.description: If set to true the replication will not trigger implicit versioning. Default is 'true'
